name: log
content: If you want report something or need a help, please upload your log here: https://smapi.io/log and share link on your uploaded log here.

name: npcadventures
content:
NPC Adventures (or NA or "It's time to adventure")is a SDV mod which allows villagers go to an adventure with you. Also adds adventuring with companions.

https://www.nexusmods.com/stardewvalley/mods/4582
